alert.note: Alert for Kootenai (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 08 at 4:28PM MDT until June 08 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Kootenai County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 415 PM PDT. * At 328 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fourth Of July Pass, or 9 miles southeast of Coeur d`Alene, moving west at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coeur d`Alene, Post Falls, Harrison, Fernan Lake Village, Huetter, Beauty Creek Campground, and Wolf Creek Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 in Idaho between mile markers 10 and 27. U.S. Highway 95 in Idaho between mile markers 413 and 431. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
